name: BotSumo - Local 2-player
description:
A simple game that can be great fun when you have a few minutes to spare. Grab a friend & use the on-screen control (there's only 1 button!), choose a bot, & push your opponent off the edge. 

If you don't want to see ads, you can now pay to hide adverts, and unlock all bots and levels. 

Please rate & comment. I'm looking for honest feedback, so if you've noticed bugs or have suggestions for more bots, please leave them as a review, or tweet me at @davidonionball. 

I have more plans and ideas for this game, but I'll only work on them if there's interest. So please rate! Thanks!
